initialPlants.name: Lavender

initialPlants.name: Rosemary
initialPlants.care: Full sunlight, water when soil is dry
initialPlants.description: Aromatic herb, thrives in sunny, well-drained locations.

initialPlants.name: Cilantro
initialPlants.care: Full sunlight, water when soil is dry
initialPlants.description: Fast-growing herb, enjoys full sun and regular watering.

initialPlants.name: Parsley
initialPlants.care: Full sunlight, water when soil is dry
initialPlants.description: Biennial herb, thrives in full sun and moist soil.

initialPlants.name: Dill
initialPlants.care: Full sunlight, water when soil is dry
initialPlants.description: Annual herb, prefers sunny locations and well-drained soil.
